title: got to gold!!!1
body: Shout out to everyone that got gold on the last day of season. really happy as i just did.

replies.body:
Congratulations! Gotta love that last minute rush feeling when it all actually works out! 

I didn't make it to gold, but managed a turnaround in my provisionals - from 1-4 to 5-5 - and managed to get ranked Silver - so I'm pretty happy!
Is that it? Will there be a small window in a couple of hours? im 2-2 in my S1 playoffs... stuck chasing last win for gold

https://gyazo.com/b98e31f60aee3dd5ac31f63783aad6d1

Wow, that last game was a loss and you didn't have time for another - This fella is the most unlucky of all for last minute pushes for gold. RIP.

now you get a silver boarder like me  :D
Congrats on gold man. I reached platinum this season from bronze its all in the mentality and  game knowledge. {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:201}}
congratz dude wish i was as successful but i went from S5 to B1 so that killed all motivation to play. But well done man well done.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
